verses.verse: Now this is the commandment<WH4687>, the statutes<WH2706>, and the ordinances<WH4941>, which Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> to teach<WH3925> you<WH6213>, that ye might do them in the land<WH776> whither ye go<WH5674> over to possess it<WH3423>;

that thou mightest fear<WH3372> Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, to keep<WH8104> all his statutes<WH2708> and his commandments<WH4687>, which I command<WH6680> thee<WH1121>, thou, and thy son, and thy son<WH1121>'s son<WH1121>, all the days<WH3117> of thy life<WH2416>; and that thy days<WH3117> may be prolonged<WH748>.

Hear <WH8085> therefore<WH3478>, O Israel, and observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> it<WH3190>; that it may be well with thee<WH7235>, and that ye may increase mightily<WH3966>, as Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of thy fathers<WH1>, hath promised<WH1696> unto thee<WH776>, in a land flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>.
Hear <WH8085>, O Israel<WH3478>: Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430> is one<WH259> Jehovah<WH3068>:
and thou shalt love<WH157> Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> with all thy heart<WH3824>, and with all thy soul<WH5315>, and with all thy might<WH3966>.
And these words<WH1697>, which I command<WH6680> thee this day<WH3117>, shall be upon thy heart<WH3824>;

and thou shalt teach them diligently<WH8150> unto thy children<WH1121>, and shalt talk<WH1696> of them when thou sittest<WH3427> in thy house<WH1004>, and when thou walkest<WH3212> by the way<WH1870>, and when thou liest down<WH7901>, and when thou risest up<WH6965>.
And thou shalt bind<WH7194> them for a sign<WH226> upon thy hand<WH3027>, and they shall be for frontlets<WH2903> between thine eyes<WH5869>.
And thou shalt write<WH3789> them upon the door-posts<WH4201> of thy house<WH1004>, and upon thy gates<WH8179>.

And it shall be<WH3068>, when Jehovah thy God<WH430> shall bring<WH935> thee into the land<WH776> which he sware<WH7650> unto thy fathers<WH1>, to Abraham<WH85>, to Isaac<WH3327>, and to Jacob<WH3290>, to give<WH5414> thee<WH1419>, great and goodly<WH2896> cities<WH5892>, which thou buildest not<WH1129>,

and houses<WH1004> full<WH4392> of all good<WH2898> things<WH4390>, which thou filledst not<WH953>, and cisterns hewn<WH2672> out<WH2672>, which thou hewedst not<WH3754>, vineyards and olive-trees<WH2132>, which thou plantedst<WH5193> not<WH398>, and thou shalt eat and be full<WH7646>;
then beware<WH8104> lest thou forget<WH7911> Jehovah<WH3068>, who brought thee forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, out of the house<WH1004> of bondage<WH5650>.
Thou shalt fear<WH3372> Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>; and him shalt thou serve<WH5647>, and shalt swear<WH7650> by his name<WH8034>.
Ye shall not go<WH3212> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430>, of the gods<WH430> of the peoples<WH5971> that are round about you<WH5439>;

for Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> in the midst<WH7130> of thee is a jealous<WH7067> God<WH410>; lest the anger<WH639> of Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> be kindled<WH2734> against thee<WH8045>, and he destroy thee from off the face<WH6440> of the earth<WH127>.
Ye shall not tempt<WH5254> Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>, as ye tempted<WH5254> him in Massah<WH4532>.
Ye shall diligently<WH8104> keep<WH8104> the commandments<WH4687> of Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>, and his testimonies<WH5713>, and his statutes<WH2706>, which he hath commanded thee<WH6680>.

And thou shalt do<WH6213> that which is right<WH3477> and good<WH2896> in the sight<WH5869> of Jehovah<WH3068>; that it may be well<WH3190> with thee<WH935>, and that thou mayest go in and possess<WH3423> the good<WH2896> land<WH776> which Jehovah<WH3068> sware<WH7650> unto thy fathers<WH1>,
to thrust out<WH1920> all thine enemies<WH341> from before<WH6440> thee<WH3068>, as Jehovah hath spoken<WH1696>.

When thy son<WH1121> asketh<WH7592> thee in time to come<WH4279>, saying<WH559>, What mean the testimonies<WH5713>, and the statutes<WH2706>, and the ordinances<WH4941>, which Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430> hath commanded you<WH6680>?

then thou shalt say<WH559> unto thy son<WH1121>, We were Pharaoh<WH6547>'s bondmen<WH5650> in Egypt<WH4714>: and Jehovah<WH3068> brought us out<WH3318> of Egypt<WH4714> with a mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027>;
and Jehovah<WH3068> showed<WH5414> signs<WH226> and wonders<WH4159>, great<WH1419> and sore<WH7451>, upon Egypt<WH4714>, upon Pharaoh<WH6547>, and upon all his house<WH1004>, before our eyes<WH5869>;
and he brought us out<WH3318> from thence<WH935>, that he might bring us in, to give<WH5414> us the land<WH776> which he sware<WH7650> unto our fathers<WH1>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> us to do<WH6213> all these statutes<WH2706>, to fear<WH3372> Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430>, for our good<WH2896> always<WH3117>, that he might preserve us alive<WH2421>, as at this day<WH3117>.
And it shall be righteousness<WH6666> unto us<WH8104>, if we observe to do<WH6213> all this<WH2063> commandment<WH4687> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430>, as he hath commanded us<WH6680>.
